caption.p: Characteristics of OLED devices with and without the YSZ scattering layer. The thickness of the YSZ scattering layer is 2.5 Î¼m: ( a) Electroluminescence spectrum of the OLED devices. The spectrum data are normalized at 1mA/cm 2; ( b) Characteristics of luminance for different voltages; ( c) Characteristics of current density for different voltages; and ( d) Characteristics of current efficiency for difference luminance.
